ingredients.content: ½ - 1 tsp dried chilli flakes, to taste
400 g tinned kidney beans, (1 tin, drained)

preparations.content: Place olive oil, onions, garlic cloves and peppers in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add tomatoes, chilli flakes, cumin and coriander then sauté <b>7 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>.
Add beef mince, tomato purée, meat stock paste, chilli sauce and salt then, with simmering basket in place of measuring cup, cook <b>15 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add beans and, with simmering basket in place of measuring cup, cook <b>5 min/100°C//speed <b>. Season to taste and serve hot.
